name: Lovely Heart Footless Tights
description:
Super comfy, We Love Colors microfiber footless tights, feelin the love created by Jill Fressinier aka Spill Art. Each pair is a wearable, original, work of art, hand painted by the artist and will vary ever so slightly. These are sure to make your legs smile!

Sizing: 
S/M - 4'11" - 5'5" 90 - 145lbs 
L/XL- 5'5" - 6'0"	135 - 200lbs

A/B - 4'11" - 5'5" 160 - 220 lbs 
C/D - 5'5" - 6'0" 215 - 275 lbs 
E - 5'5" - 6'0" 270 - 325 lbs 
EE - 5'5" - 6'0" 320 - 375 lbs

Hand wash, lay flat to dry.

After placing an order with your color choice, please email spillart@welovecolors.com with your size choice. Thank you!

For our colors and kid's sizes send your request to spillart@welovecolors.com 
To view our 50+ colors please click the Color Chart link located in the column to your right.

categories.name: Spill Art for We Love Colors FOOTLESS TIGHTS

name: Boom! for Real Patch Footed Tights
description:
We Love Colors microfiber footed tights with the adorable Spill Art BOOM! FOR REAL PATCH patch, homage to Jean Michel Basquiat. Each patch is an original work of art, lovingly hand painted by the artist and will vary slightly. For more fun, we've added fluorescent qualities! When your tights are well worn out, you can save your collectible patch and recycle your tights!

Sizing: 
S/M -   4'11" - 5'5"    90 - 135lbs
M/L-    5'5"  - 5'11"	135 - 168lbs

A/B -    4'11" - 5'5"   160 - 220 lbs
C/D -    5'5" - 6'0"     215 - 275 lbs
E -        5'5" - 6'0"     270 - 325 lbs
EE -      5'5" - 6'0"     320 - 375 lbs

90% Nylon / 10% Lycra
Hand wash, lay flat to dry.

For our other colors and kid's sizes please send your request to spillart@welovecolors.com
To view our 50+ colors please click the Color Chart link located in the column to your right. 

Model Juliette Fressinier, Nicolle Clemetson Photography, Jennifer O'Bannon Fashion Stylist, Melissa Jarosz H&MU
